Name: Home Wind
About the game: A Minimalist, Relaxing and Cozy... ... game that allows you to build large settlements in no time! Plan Strategically... ... to get high prosperity points, allowing you to scale the settlement further. More than 100 levels... ... earn Contracts and complete levels to unlock larger maps. If you are considering downloading Home Wind , is important to know that the game does not have the deep systems or mechanics that you might expect from a classic RTS or city-builder.
